physDesc.p: Fragments 1-17 (in mm), (1) 21 x 41, (A) 3 lines, no margins, (B) blank, (2) 50 x 30, (A) 9 lines, no margins, (B) traces of 7 lines, (3) 55 x 15, (A) 6 lines, no margins, (B) blank, (4) 50 x 17, (A) 5 lines, top margin (?), (B) blank, (5) 50 x 24, (A) 4 lines, bottom margin (?), (B) blank, (6) 60 x 25, (A) 7 lines, top margin (?), (B) traces, (7) 38 x 45, (A) 8 lines, left margin, (B) blank, (8) 26 x 25, (A) 2 lines, no margins, (B) blank, (9) 27 x 21, (A) 3 lines, no margins, (B) 4 lines, no margins, (10) 47 x 38, (A) 2 lines, top margin, (B) blank, (11) 37 x 22, (A) 2 lines, no margins, (B) 4 lines, no margins, (12) 24 x 23, (A) 4 lines, no margins, (B) blank, (13) 67 x 39, (A) 11 lines, no margins, (B) 8 lines, no margins, (14) 72 x 84, (A) 11 lines, no margins, (B) blank, (15) 76 x 36, (A) 10 lines (?), left margin (?), (B) blank
